all_questions.question: Who is the head of the economics department at Unicredit Global?
all_questions.context: My name is Erik Nielsen and I'm head of the economics department at Unicredit Global.

all_questions.question: What is the exception to adopting a single currency in the EU?
all_questions.context: There is also the exception of Great Britain and Denmark, which do not have to introduce the euro.

all_questions.question: Why was the introduction of the euro initially met with negative forecasts in Slovakia?
all_questions.context: Some forecasts were negative at the beginning.

all_questions.question: What was the GDP per year of the Czech Republic?
all_questions.context: The republic had 10 million inhabitants and industry was important for it. The GDP was 3,300 euros per year.

all_questions.question: What was the rate of economic growth in Slovakia between 2009 and 2016?
all_questions.context: The economy grew by 1.6% per year.
